    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92933</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92933</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Balancing moments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgleichende Momente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moments d'équilibrage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Momentos balançando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Momenti d'equilibratura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισορροπώντας στιγμές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Momentos que balancean</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that moments depend not only on the amount of force but also on the distance from the pivot.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balanced moments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß Momente nicht nur von
der Stärke aber auch vom Abstand vom Gelenk abhängen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que les moments dépendent non 
seulement de la force mais également de la distance du pivot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que os momentos dependem 
não somente da quantidade de força mas também da distância do 
pivô.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che i momenti dipendono non 
soltanto dalla forza ma anche dalla distanza dal perno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι οι στιγμές εξαρτώνται 
όχι μόνο από το ποσό δύναμης αλλά και από την απόσταση από 
τον άξονα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que los momentos dependen 
no solamente de la fuerza pero también de la distancia del pivote.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ausgeglichene Momente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gelenk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">drehenkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">moments équilibrés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pivot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momentos equilibrados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pivô</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força de giro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">momenti equilibrati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">perno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza di rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ισορροπημένες στιγμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άξονας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γυρίζοντας δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">momentos equilibrados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pivote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza que da vuelta</string>
          </keyword>
